3001.name: Plunge
3001.effect: Plunge the opponent into the water.

3002.name: Clamp
3002.effect: Clamp and squeeze the opponent with a very thick and sturdy shell. This move prevents both the user and the opponent from switching out.

3003.name: Aqua Jet
3003.effect: Lunge at the target like a jet. This move deals double damage if the user is under the water.

3004.name: Submerge
3004.effect: Dive under the water and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Electric typed moves during this turn.

3005.name: Geyser
3005.effect: Slam into the opponent with full-force blast of water. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

3006.name: Torrent Climb
3006.effect: Hit the opponent with a blow packing the power of fish travelling up waterfalls.

3007.name: Razor Shell
3007.effect: Cut the opponent with sharp shell to inflict damage. This move has a 20% chance of reducing the target's Defense stat.

3008.name: Tide Rush
3008.effect: Swamp on a giant wave to strike the opponent.

3009.name: Surging Strikes
3009.effect: Strike the opponent with a flowing motion of water 3 times in a row. This move has a 100% critical hit chance.

3010.name: Tidal Twister
3010.effect: Trap the opponent inside a violent, swirling whirlpool that inflict damage for 3-5 turns.

3011.name: Wave Crash
3011.effect: Shroud in water and slam into the target with the whole body. This move hurts the user by a third of the damage dealt.

3012.name: Water Gun
3012.effect: Blast at the opponent with a shot of water.

3013.name: Water Bomb
3013.effect: Attack the opponent with a strong blast of water. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target in confusion.

3014.name: Chilling Water
3014.effect: Shower the opponent with chilling cold water. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target frozen.

3015.name: Bubble Burst
3015.effect: Splash the opponent with a giant water bubble. If targeting a foe, the harsh torrent will hurt them. If targeting an ally, cleansing water will soothe and heal them.

3016.name: Maroon
3016.effect: Wash the opponent(s) with an enourmous wave of water. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Attack stat.

3017.name: Scald
3017.effect: Shoot boiling water at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of leaving the target with a burn. This move also thaws the target.

3018.name: Aqua Blast
3018.effect: Summon a massive amount of water and blast it at the opponent in full force.

3019.name: Tsunami
3019.effect: Set off a tsunami that drowns everyone around the user, foes and allies.

3020.name: Hydro Cannon
3020.effect: Blast the opponent with a huge volume of water launched under great pressure. This move also has a 20% chance of flinching the target.

3021.name: Origin Pulse
3021.effect: Fire countless beams of brilliant blue water from the deep at the opponent. The user can't move on the next turn.

3022.name: Rain Fall
3022.effect: Summon a heavy rain that falls for 5 turns. The rain powers up Water-type moves by 50% and lowers the power of Fire-type moves by 50%.

3023.name: Aqua Veil
3023.effect: The user envelopes itself in a veil made of water. This move restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.

3024.name: Holy Water
3024.effect: Scatter pure water around and restore the HP of the user and its ally on the field.

3025.name: Drench
3025.effect: Shoot a torrent of water that changes the target's type into Water for 3-5 turns.

3026.name: Flowing Barrier
3026.effect: Create a water barrier to surround the body, protecting the user from the next damaging move(s). If used successfully, this move recovers 1/8 of the user's HP. The success rate is reduced by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.
